H0.text: In which year was the £2 coin issued and introduced in the UK, although minted in the previous year. 1996

H1.text: In which year was the £2 coin issued and introduced in the UK, although minted in the previous year. 1997

H2.text: In which year was the £2 coin issued and introduced in the UK, although minted in the previous year. 1999

H3.text: In which year was the £2 coin issued and introduced in the UK, although minted in the previous year. 1998

A4.text: The coin was released on 15 June 1998 (coins minted 1997)

A5.text: The 1997-dated coins... were not released to circulation until June 1998 (the same time as the 1998-dated coins)
